Class DockingStation

java.lang.Object
fr.cs.group13.myVelib.core.dockingstation.DockingStation
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlusStation, RegularStation
public abstract class DockingStation extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • DockingStation

      public DockingStation()
      Constructs a DockingStation object with a unique ID.

    • DockingStation

      public DockingStation(VelibSystem vlibSys, double[] gpsCord, int numberOfSlots, int numberOfVacantSlots, int numberOfElectricalBikes)
      Constructs a DockingStation object with the specified parameters, automatically creates ParkingSlot and Bicycle objects
      Parameters:
      gpsCord - The GPS coordinates of the docking station.
      numberOfSlots - The total number of slots in the docking station.
      numberOfVacantSlots - The number of initially vacant slots in the docking station.
      numberOfElectricalBikes - The number of initially available electrical bikes in the docking station.
